responseText: As I suspected! That pompous Kaelar is looting the stories of my people from their very graves! No doubt the bastard intends to pass them off as ancient valuables, antiques worth the shiniest Kaelar coin. Well, blast that! I will organize my Zephyr Wind and we shall fall upon them with righteous fury. You'd do well to distance yourself from him if you wish to avoid our wrath. Further, If you rescue more artifacts of my people, bring them to me. I will keep them safe from those Kaelar pillagers.
name: SQ_RVR_NPC_Samias_Miraleth_Sabah_45_Response
